activities: We offer a software package called Blazon that allows businesses to establish online contests using social media.  Our software gathers name and email address data, along with other custom fields requested by the contest administrator (the business using the software).  Additionally, contest administrators are able to ask survey questions using our software.  We maintain a database of responses associated with the contest entrant. TRUSTe is our 3rd party dispute mechanism and verification program.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, Email Address, Other Collected Elements Pursuant to Client Need (Such as Address, Certain Personal Preferences, Other Survey Data)
recoursemech: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor, a private sector developed dispute resolution mechanism that incorporates the Safe Harbor Framework(s).
